column4: i was thinking about getting a new wireless adapter and was wondering if there are restrictions on which ones will work with ubuntu
where would i find this list of supported chipsets?
is a pci/pcie card any better than a usb adapter?
It's much easier to configure in Ubuntu.  It makes you look less like a noob.
besides devede. i already have it but its not doing what i want
It does exactly what you asked for?
It produces an ISO that you can burn.
the menu it makes is simply a background picture. i want a menu with episode listings
It puts each title it's own menu itme
I'm using an older version (Debian) perhaps it's changed.  Sorry if I wasted your time! :(
no you have not. i just realized i think i messed up when making the disc
you know if you can change position of the menu text. not the title text. that i can move but i want to change location of heading
I don't think it lets you.  Sadly :(
